definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: It is when we trust in His goodness that we find gladness.
sentences.chinese: 相信他的良善，便能心生喜樂。

sentences.english: The Chinese values the happy cheerful atmosphere that the family when spending the New Year reunites very much.
sentences.chinese: 中國人非常看重過年時全家團聚的喜樂氣氛。

sentences.english: Having joy produces hope and strength.
sentences.chinese: 有喜樂纔會產生盼望和力量。

sentences.english: Pleasure is frail like a dewdrop， while it laughs it dies.
sentences.chinese: 喜樂像露珠一樣地脆弱，它在歡笑中死去。

sentences.english: Then the gates of his heart were flung open, and his joy flew far over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他的心門砉然地開了，他的喜樂在海面飛翔。

sentences.english: Let me fill you with love and joy, and we will meet again.
sentences.chinese: 讓我再次爲你填滿愛與喜樂，我們將會再見。

sentences.english: Joy is the flag that is flown from the castle of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 喜樂如旗正飄揚從我心中的城堡。

sentences.english: Joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
sentences.chinese: 喜樂是愛的網，這個網能抓住靈魂。

sentences.english: He is like wearing a sheep, sheep sheep set sail under the south.
sentences.chinese: 身穿羊裝喜樂羊，羊帆起航下南羊。

sentences.english: For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing?
sentences.chinese: 我們的盼望和喜樂，並所誇的冠冕，是什麼呢。

sentences.english: People go to the seaside to catch a new breath, to play, a simple joy and experience.
sentences.chinese: 人們到海邊，解憂，喜樂，單純的一種享受與體驗。
喜樂是愛被高舉時的情緒。

sentences.english: Sorrow is better than laughter, because a sad face is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 憂愁強如喜笑，因爲面帶愁容，終必使心喜樂。

sentences.english: Jason Ray was a ray of joy on the University of North Carolina campus in Chapel Hill.
sentences.chinese: 雷傑森是北卡羅來納大學教堂山分校的喜樂之光。

sentences.english: A man finds joy in giving an apt reply- and how good is a timely word!
sentences.chinese: 口善應對，自覺喜樂，話合其時，何等美好。

sentences.english: Either attitude will take you out of service and rob you of your joy.
sentences.chinese: 兩種態度都會令你離開事奉崗位，奪去你的喜樂。

definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
